trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um Estado num <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateActivity represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O StateActivity representa um estado numa <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or StateActivity classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: Atividades de estado pode conter um ou mais <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, ou StateActivity classes, uma <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>classe e uma <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Atividades de SetState são utilizadas no interior de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>para mover o estado do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>

trans-unit.source: When a StateActivity is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the StateActivity and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing StateActivity activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Quando está a executar um StateActivity, os eventos só podem ser recebidos estão os eventos que podem ser processados pelas <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>atividades de StateActivity e também a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>atividades ligados às atividades de StateActivity envolvente e raiz <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the StateActivity starts running, the StateActivity will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
trans-unit.target: Quando a StateActivity começa a ser executada, o StateActivity irá verificar se um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>atividade está presente ou não.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: O StateActivity pode ter zero ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>atividade está presente o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>será executado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the StateActivity blocks events so that the StateActivity only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: Assim que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>atividade é concluída, os eventos de blocos StateActivity, para que o StateActivity apenas recebe eventos que podem ser processados pelo respetivo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the StateActivity activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O StateActivity é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que a atividade de StateActivity pode conter outras atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classe com o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo utilizador da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the execution of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a execução do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de execução para a atividade.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> na instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de execução para a atividade.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> na instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução.

trans-unit.source: Gets the executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância em execução do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que corresponde ao nome de atividade subordinado especificado.

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: A atividade subordinada.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities.
trans-unit.target: Atividades subordinadas dinâmico.

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the childActivityName.
trans-unit.target: As atividades executável não contêm o childActivityName .

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> utilizando o fornecedor de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de serviços partir do qual obter serviços.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the activity being added is an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a atividade que está a ser adicionada um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> e se assim for, verifica se o evento recém-adicionado orientadas por tem de ser subscritos.

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Este é o método é denominado sempre que um utilizador adiciona um subordinado a um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>através de alterações de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que este método é definido no CompositeActivity e substituído pelo StateActivity, onde verifica se a atividade que está a ser adicionada é um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>e se assim for, verifica se o evento recém-adicionado orientadas por tem de ser subscritos.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de execução para a atividade.

trans-unit.source: The activity added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A atividade adicionada para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo motor de runtime de fluxo de trabalho como parte da transição da atividade para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> estado.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de serviços partir do qual obter serviços.

trans-unit.source: Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor da cadeia de chave de dados do registo de alterações "StateActivity.StateChange".

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é uma constante.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
